description: This Java class 'AlwaysPassMacroExpression' extends 'MacroExpression' to always evaluate to true, serving as a static true expression in substitution macros.

classes.name: AlwaysPassMacroExpression
classes.description: A subclass of MacroExpression that always evaluates to true for substitution macros.

methods.name: AlwaysPassMacroExpression
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the macro with type IF.

methods.name: evaluate
methods.description: Overrides the evaluate method to always return true.
